#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define  mp make_pair
#define MOD 1000000007
#define sc(n) scanf("%d",&n);
#define p(n)   printf("%d",n);
#define nl      printf("\n");

using namespace std;


int arr[1000001];
char s1[100001];
char s2[100001];
int main()
{
	int n,m;
int t,i,j,rem,k;
//string s1,s2;
sc(t)
while(t--)
{
scanf("%s",s1);
scanf("%s",s2);	

//cin>>s2;
//carry=0;
i=(strlen(s1))-1;
j=(strlen(s2))-1;
rem=0,k=0;
for(;i>=0&&j>=0;i--,j--)
{
	arr[k]=0;
	int val=(int)(s1[i]-'A')+(int)(s2[j]-'A')+rem;
	rem=val/26;
	arr[k++]=val%26;


}

//cout<<endl;
int  s=0;int x=-1;
if(i>=0)
{
s=1;	
x=i;	
//cout<<"good"<<endl;;
}

if(j>=0)
s=2,x=j;
//for(int y=k-1;y>=0;y--)
//		cout<<(char)(arr[y]+65);
//		cout<<endl;
//	cout<<i<<j<<endl;
int val	;
for(;x>=0;x--)
{arr[k]=0;
if(s==1)
	val=(int)(s1[x]-'A')+rem;
else
 val=(int)(s2[x]-'A')+rem;	
	
	rem=val/26;
	arr[k++]=val%26;
//c10out<<"good"<<endl;
}
	
if(rem>0)
{
	arr[k++]=rem;
}
       

for(i=k-1;i>=0;i--)
{
	printf("%c",(char)(arr[i]+65));
}	

printf("\n");

}


	return 0;
}
